channel.title: Recent Reviews Near San Francisco, CA
channel.description: Yelp - Recent Reviews Near San Francisco, CA

item.title: Lisa Z.'s Review of Score! Bar and Lounge - San Francisco (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Super chill place with awesome bartenders. Pool table and beer pong! Come here to watch the game and grab some drinks

item.title: Amy G.'s Review of El Farolito - San Francisco (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Terrible customer service! They added more tip than I gave and stole from me! Never going back again!!

item.title: Jennifer G.'s Review of Whole Foods Market Ocean - San Francisco (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: First off let me say that I love whole foods(15)years of shopping with them Well now that you read that you know this review is going to be somewhat biassed So anyway I have been coming to this store…

item.title: Kiesha R.'s Review of The Commissary - San Francisco (3/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Much, much potential...but it's gonna take some steps to get there.
The dishes sound delicious and almost meet expectations. The underlying flavors are there, and they are right - yet, there is a…

item.title: Matthias H.'s Review of Elemental LED - Emeryville (2/5) on Yelp
item.description: This is a review for their Valent 360 Very High Output light strip. I'd post the review on their web site, but I don't trust their selection of reviews (all positive of course), and I don't want to…

item.title: oc n.'s Review of Comcast - San Rafael (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: The fact that I needed to click even one star for this review is just a new level of wrong. Coast to coast and internationally, I've never had so many problems, issues and headaches and issues with a…

item.title: Claire J.'s Review of The Tipsy Pig - San Francisco (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Absolutely unbelievable service. Today is the Fourth of July and one of my friends Is wearing a blue sweatshirt and pants. We were turned away because he was wearing a "uniform." We are loyal patrons…

item.title: Sean P.'s Review of Saha - San Francisco (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Excellent service and fantastic food. Went in a big group for Sunday brunch and everyone was amazed by the quality of the food. Everyone left full and happy what more can you ask for?

item.title: Charles L.'s Review of Shin Dig - San Francisco (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: My wife and I had an event here last weekend and it was a wonderful experience from start to finish. The space is beautiful and the wines were incredible. The management was extraordinarily helpful…

item.title: Tom O.'s Review of The Codmother Fish and Chips - San Francisco (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: 100% completely mislead about the amount of time it took to prepare the fish and chips. 10 minutes is not the same as 45 minutes. Infuriating!

item.title: Steffi M.'s Review of Braids And More By Char - Oakland (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: The pictures are beautiful but I couldn't get my hair done because she doesn't answer texts or pick up the phone. I asked her via instagram when is her next available appointment and she told me to…

item.title: Michael B.'s Review of Cafe GoLo - San Francisco (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Let's say you are on a family vacation, you Yelp Cafe Golo, like the reviews, find parking and get everyone to the restraunt and get your name on the list for a party of 5. Then, you need to go the…

item.title: Scott G.'s Review of Nancy Kwon Hsieh, DDS MS - San Francisco (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: This was my 3 year old son's first dentist visit and we could not have had a better experience. The office is super clean and kid friendly. The staff was very gentle and Mrs. Dr. Dixon was super,…

item.title: Katie F.'s Review of Parkmerced - San Francisco (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: You know an apartment complex is bad when they get one star reviews from those who have lived there and those who have just LOOKED into living there. This place is BS. They post daily ads on…

item.title: Tenzin B.'s Review of Kaiju Eats Ramen and Izakaya - San Francisco (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: This place is legitimate. I'm not a ramen expert but I have eaten my fair share of ramen. Abs delish Ramen and the broth is piping hot. Must visit !

item.title: Jenn S.'s Review of Golden Lotus Vegetarian Restaurant - Oakland (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: The entire visit can be summed up with "it was okay." It wasn't bad by any means, but it also wasn't spectacular. The interior, menus, utensils were all kinda shabby but not off-putting. Service was…

item.title: Shirley M.'s Review of Pluto's - San Francisco (4/5) on Yelp
item.description:
I have been here a couple of times and they were all good experiences.
I always order a small salad ~$8 (which is just the right amount to fill me up). The first time i went I created my own salad…

item.title: Hannah B.'s Review of Cafe GoLo - San Francisco (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: I would love to review this restaurant based on the food, but unfortunately I can't. The wait staff would not let us use the restroom before we were seated which in my opinion is outrageous. They lost…

item.title: Bill P.'s Review of Sleep Train Mattress Centers - San Francisco (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Fiza Fawad took great care of us today. She was very informative and helpful with our selection decision. Sleep train had great prices, helpful staff, and enough inventory on hand to deliver our new…

item.title: Jason T.'s Review of Putnam Mazda - Burlingame (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: I just purchased a new Mazda 3 and I could not be happier. I read the reviews on Yelp and decided to go with Gary the internet manager. He was direct to the point and extremely nice. He made the…

item.title: Ryan I.'s Review of Burma Superstar - Oakland (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: This place was amazing. Everything was so flavorful and savory. The Tea leaf salad is a must. The chicken in the chicken Dahl curry was super tender and delicious. Highly recommend! Also you can bring…

item.title: Kiesha R.'s Review of Humphry Slocombe Ice Cream - San Francisco (5/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Positively outstanding.
I had the Secret Breakfast, which has already been discussed in great detail in many other reviews. I'd ask, "Who knew bourbon and corn flakes could be so good?" but, well,…

item.title: Angela V.'s Review of Hillstone - San Francisco (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Disappointing that a fine restaurant like Hillstone can't keep the children and dogs out of the bar! At 9pm we were surrounded by a table of shrieking two and five year olds and a crying baby in…

item.title: Steven B.'s Review of The Crew - San Francisco (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Came here after another place nearby didn't work out. What a find this was. We love Korean food and never heard of this place before. This was the best Korean food we have had. I loved the spicy…

item.title: Dale C.'s Review of Il Casaro Pizzeria & Mozzarella Bar - San Francisco (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: We stopped here by walking by and seeing an open table and am glad we found this place. The pizza came out very fast and was cooked perfectly. We had the quattro fromage pizza. It reminded BME of…
